title: Admin Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify successful login with valid ROLE_ADMIN credentials and receipt of JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid admin username and password.
Click login button.
Verify login is successful.
Verify JWT token is issued and stored.
Verify user is redirected to Dashboard tab.

title: Admin Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login attempt with invalid credentials is rejected and error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter invalid username or password.
Click login button.
Verify login is rejected.
Verify appropriate error message is displayed.
Verify user remains on the login page.

title: Admin Access Forbidden for Non-Admin Roles
description: Verify users without ROLE_ADMIN cannot access admin functionalities.

steps.description: Login with user having non-ADMIN role.
Attempt to access Dashboard or other admin tabs.
Verify access is denied by backend API.
Verify user is redirected to an unauthorized or login page.

title: JWT Token Expiry and Refresh Handling
description: Verify that expired JWT tokens reject requests and user is prompted to re-login.

steps.description: Login as admin and obtain valid JWT token.
Wait for token expiry or simulate expired token.
Attempt to perform authenticated API request.
Verify request is rejected due to expired token.
Verify user is redirected to login page with message.

title: View Dashboard Statistics and Charts
description: Verify dashboard displays correct statistics and visual summaries for current academic year and semester.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to Dashboard tab.
Verify key statistics for professors, courses, submissions, missing and overdue documents are displayed.
Verify charts are rendered correctly.
Change semester or academic year filter.
Verify dashboard data dynamically updates to reflect selected filters.

title: Create New User with Valid Data
description: Verify admin can create a new user with all required valid fields including role assignment.

steps.description: Navigate to Users tab.
Click add new user button and fill user form with valid fields.
Submit the user creation form.
Verify user is created and visible in the users list.
Verify success notification is displayed.

title: User Creation Validation Errors
description: Verify form validation prevents user creation with missing required fields or invalid input such as incorrect email format or duplicate username/email.

steps.description: Navigate to Users tab and open new user form.
Leave required fields empty and attempt to submit.
Verify validation errors are shown for required fields.
Enter invalid email format and submit.
Verify email format validation error is shown.
Enter duplicate username or email and submit.
Verify duplication error is shown preventing submission.

title: Edit Existing User Data
description: Verify admin can update user information and role, and changes are reflected in the listing.

steps.description: Navigate to Users tab.
Select an existing user and open edit form.
Modify user details including role and submit.
Verify changes are saved and visible in the users list.
Verify edit success notification is displayed.

title: Soft Delete User and Verify Deactivation
description: Verify admin can soft delete user which deactivates the user but retains data and removes user from active listings.

steps.description: Navigate to Users tab.
Select a user and click delete (soft delete).
Confirm deletion in confirmation dialog.
Verify user is removed from active user lists.
Verify user data is retained in backend.

title: Pagination and Filtering in Users List
description: Verify pagination controls work correctly and user list can be filtered using various criteria.

steps.description: Navigate to Users tab with a large user dataset.
Use pagination controls to navigate through pages.
Verify correct user subset is displayed per page.
Apply filters such as by role, name, or status.
Verify filtered user results are shown and pagination adjusts accordingly.

title: Create and Manage Departments with Valid Data
description: Verify admin can create, edit, and safely delete academic departments, enforcing dependency rules.

steps.description: Navigate to Departments tab.
Add a new department with all required information.
Verify new department appears in the listing.
Edit existing department data and save changes.
Verify edits update the department record.
Attempt to delete a department without dependencies.
Verify department is deleted after confirmation.
Attempt to delete a department with associated users or courses.
Verify deletion is blocked with appropriate error notification.

title: Department Creation Validation Errors
description: Verify form validation prevents submission of departments with missing required fields or duplicate department names.

steps.description: Navigate to Departments tab and open add department form.
Leave required fields empty and submit.
Verify validation errors are shown.
Enter duplicate department name and submit.
Verify duplication error prevents submission.

title: Course CRUD Operations with Dependency Checks
description: Verify admin can create, read, update, and delete courses with enforcement of dependency constraints against deleting courses with active assignments.

steps.description: Navigate to Courses tab.
Add a new course with valid data including department association.
Verify new course appears in list with correct details.
Edit existing course details and save.
Verify course data is updated.
Attempt to delete a course with no active professor assignments.
Verify course is deleted after confirmation.
Attempt to delete a course currently assigned to professors.
Verify deletion is blocked and error notification is shown.

title: Course Filtering and Search Functionality
description: Verify courses can be filtered by department and searched by name or code within the UI.

steps.description: Navigate to Courses tab.
Apply department filter.
Verify displayed courses belong only to selected department.
Use search input to filter courses by name or code.
Verify only matching courses are displayed.

title: Assign Course to Professor for Specific Semester
description: Verify admin can assign a course to a professor for a selected academic year and semester with validation of inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to Course Assignments section.
Select professor, course, academic year, and semester.
Submit assignment form.
Verify course is assigned to professor successfully.
Verify assignment appears in listing filtered by semester.

title: Prevent Duplicate Course Assignments
description: Verify system prevents assigning the same course multiple times to the same professor within the same semester.

steps.description: Assign course to professor for semester as per normal flow.
Attempt to assign same course again to same professor for the same semester.
Verify validation error is displayed preventing duplicate assignment.

title: Unassign Course from Professor
description: Verify admin can unassign a previously assigned course from a professor for a specific semester.

steps.description: Navigate to Course Assignments list filtered by semester.
Select assigned course entry and click unassign/delete.
Confirm unassignment action.
Verify assignment is removed from list.
Verify unassignment success notification is shown.

title: Generate Reports with Filter Combinations
description: Verify reports can be generated based on selected academic year, semester, and department filters displaying appropriate data.

steps.description: Navigate to Reports tab.
Select filters for academic year, semester, and department.
Click generate report button.
Verify report data corresponds to selected filters.
Verify report view is rendered correctly with data summaries.

title: Export Report as PDF
description: Verify report export functionality generates valid PDF documents consistent with displayed report data.

steps.description: Generate report with filters applied.
Click export to PDF button.
Verify PDF file is generated and downloaded.
Verify PDF content matches report data.

title: UI Responsiveness Across Devices
description: Verify the admin panel UI adjusts layout and elements appropriately on different screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile).

steps.description: Open admin panel on desktop screen size.
Verify all tabs, forms, and dashboards render correctly.
Resize window or use device emulator for tablet size.
Verify UI elements rearrange suitably, remain accessible and readable.
Resize window or use device emulator for mobile size.
Verify navigation tabs collapse or stack properly, modals function and UI is usable.

title: Theme Toggle and Persistence
description: Verify toggling between light and dark modes updates UI theme and preference is saved in localStorage for persistence across sessions.

steps.description: Login to admin panel.
Toggle theme switch from light to dark mode.
Verify UI updates styling to dark mode.
Logout and login again.
Verify dark mode preference persists on reload.
Toggle back to light mode.
Verify styling updates and preference persists again.

title: Modal Forms and Confirmation Dialogs Workflow
description: Verify all CRUD actions are performed through modals with proper validation, confirmation dialogs and user feedback.

steps.description: Trigger add/edit/delete actions from various tabs (Users, Departments, Courses, Assignments).
Verify modal form opens with relevant fields and validation.
Try invalid form submission to check front-end validation messages.
Submit valid form and confirm deletion dialogs as applicable.
Verify actions complete successfully with toast notifications.

title: API Unauthorized Access Handling
description: Verify backend API endpoints reject requests with invalid, expired, or missing JWT tokens returning appropriate HTTP error codes.

steps.description: Make API requests to protected endpoints without JWT token.
Verify HTTP 401 Unauthorized status is returned.
Make API requests with expired or malformed JWT tokens.
Verify HTTP 401 Unauthorized status and error messages.

title: Performance Under Large Dataset Scenario
description: Verify pagination and filtering performs acceptably with large number of entries (users, courses, departments).

steps.description: Load users, courses, and departments lists with thousands of records each.
Perform filtering and pagination actions rapidly.
Verify UI remains responsive and data updates without lag or error.
